pages.text: Crates are reinforced containers which can store the same amount of items as a double chest. They are available in all wood types.$(br2)$(br2)$(o)Twice the storage, half the space, barely over twice the price!
Trapped crates can be crafted using a crate and a tripwire hook, much the same as a trapped chest.
Two crates or trapped crates of the same type can connect to form a large crate.
